ADANIENT.NS.summary: Adanient is a leading Indian company operating in the Diversified sector with activities across India and international markets. The company is primarily engaged in core businesses related to diversified, and its operations include manufacturing, distribution and services tailored to its market. Over the years, Adanient has expanded its portfolio through strategic investments, joint ventures and capacity additions to strengthen its presence in the conglomerate industry. Adanient serves a diverse customer base including retail, institutional and enterprise clients and focuses on innovation, operational efficiency and regulatory compliance. The company maintains a network of manufacturing sites, regional offices and service centres, and reports on sustainability, corporate governance and community engagement as part of its annual disclosures.

Over the years, Jiofin has expanded its portfolio through strategic investments, joint ventures and capacity additions to strengthen its presence in the financial services industry. Jiofin serves a diverse customer base including retail, institutional and enterprise clients and focuses on innovation, operational efficiency and regulatory compliance. The company maintains a network of manufacturing sites, regional offices and service centres, and reports on sustainability, corporate governance and community engagement as part of its annual disclosures.
